S

SampleClient - Class in <Unnamed>
- Client listens and writes to the OrderManager
- Generate and send orders to the OrderManager
- Receive updates from the OrderManager about the state of its orders
SampleClient(int, int, InetSocketAddress) - Constructor for class SampleClient
 
SampleLiveMarketData - Class in <Unnamed>

- LiveMarketData listens to the OrderManager
- Set the current price of an order
SampleOrderManager - Class in <Unnamed>
 
SampleOrderManager(int) - Constructor for class SampleOrderManager
 
SampleRouter - Class in <Unnamed>
- Router listens to the OrderManager
- If called using the bestPrice method, returns the price for the order as given in MockConfig
- If called using the newFill method, informs the OrderManager of the price of a new fill for the order
SampleRouter(InetSocketAddress) - Constructor for class SampleRouter
 
SampleTrader - Class in <Unnamed>
- Trader listens to the OrderManager
- Decides if an order can be directly fill or if it needs to be sliced
- Returns its choice to the OrderManager
